faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.desc: Learn more about Voxa — our showcase AI tool that demonstrates how Hyperjump builds and deploys intelligent agents for real-world use cases.
faq.0_question: Is Voxa a SaaS product I can subscribe to?
faq.0_answer: Not yet. Voxa is currently a showcase tool developed by Hyperjump to demonstrate our AI product development capability.
faq.1_question: Can I try Voxa or see it in action?
faq.1_answer: Yes! You can watch a full demo video on this page to see how Voxa works across different outreach flows and use cases.
faq.2_answer: You can generate your own message or use our AI to generate the message, then we will use it to generate the speech based on the text provided
faq.3_question: Can Voxa replace my customer service agent?
faq.3_answer: Unfortunately, Voxa is currently designed for a one-way approach. We are still developing Voxa to be able to interactively talk with your customers.
faq.4_question: Is this tool already used in real projects?
faq.4_answer: While not in public use, Voxa has been internally tested and demonstrated with simulated campaigns to show real-life performance.
faq.5_question: Can Hyperjump build something similar for my company?
faq.5_answer: Absolutely. Voxa reflects our AI and automation capabilities, and we can develop tailored versions based on your specific needs.
